name: Lucian Moreau

quirks.name: Charismatic Resonance
quirks.description: A natural ability to inspire trust and fervent loyalty, turning abstract ideas into powerful, motivating forces for large groups of people.

key_quote: They gave us the words, but we must write our own story.
narrative_arc: Having successfully navigated his first 'litmus test', Moreau is consolidating his power as the leader of the Aletheia movement. His arc is about navigating the treacherous world of post-liberation Parisian politics, balancing his ideals against the practical realities of power, all while being subtly guided by an unknown force.
